name: Catch Royale
description:
Conquer the Catch Royale's everchanging seasonal maps as a hunter and catch them foxes or flip the coin, show your inner escape artist, and choose to be part of the foxes team.

The concept is plain and simple: The hunters' task is to tag them foxes, aka catch them, as the name indicates. However, the longer you survive as a fox, the higher your reward is.

Various settings, various parameters:
  • Try out Party mode, in which, instead of the standard 100-player mode, you can battle amongst 250 other fighters.
  • For the full experience, we added an optional Smart AI mode, in which you can set the other AI-handled foxes and hunters to find the optimal route to simulate the best experience.

What can I do with my XP?

The game offers 20 skins you can earn as you go up the staircase of experience points, each with a 5000 XP gap.

Future features that are yet to come:

  • Plain multiplayer mode
  • Replay mode
  • Create and publish your levels
